::KitKat::

She heard the door open and saw Phobia standing there.  She 
smiled,"Hello again.  What bring you by our humble abode?" She said 
with a smirk.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Phobia monitored the battle, unhappy about the losses the Predacons 
had
> suffered. "The offer to become a Maximal is looking better by the 
moment" he
> thought as he assesed the damage to KitKat popularity.
> 
> Then he realized that it was the attacking Maximals who had ignored 
his
> message pod during the last battle. "Right now Oblivion doesn't 
look so bad.
> If everybot's an idiot then maybe no future was a good thing then he
> remembered KitKat opening the door for another bot.
> 
>  The other bot had an arrogance in him that seemed somehow familiar 
to
> history, the arrogance of a wannabe leader. An arrogance to be 
directed,
> pushed, and manipulated..
> 
> Phobia landed his ship outside the Predacon cave, scanning for the 
Maximals
> responsible for the attack, he exited his ship and looked toward 
the crashed
> ship. "Another wonderful anomaly"he thought to himself, glareing at 
the
> damage. He entered the cave and began to take a head count.
> 
> 
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: <logomorph@h...>
> To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
> Sent: Wednesday, August 30, 2000 7:48 PM
> Subject: Re: The Pain Of KitKat
> 
> 
> >
> > ::KitKat::
> >
> > She hugged him managed to smile at Drillbit.  "Yeah, let's."  She
> > took his arm and went with him to the pod.
> >
> >
> > --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> > > ::DrillBit::
> > >
> > > "Yeah, lets check that out." he said, walking outside.
> > > "And, you DID do the right thing. You saved her." He said.
> >
